snippet: Some of Chris Chocola’s past votes as a Republican lawmaker from Indiana are at odds with the principles of his free-market advocacy group, the Club for Growth.
abstract: Some of Chris Chocola’s votes as a Republican lawmaker from Indiana between 2003 to 2007 are at odds with the principles of his free-market advocacy group, the Club for Growth; club enjoys an increasingly influential position, rating members of Congress on their fiscally conservative purism and fielding primary opponents when they do not measure up.
lead_paragraph: Some of Chris Chocola’s past votes as a Republican lawmaker from Indiana are at odds with the principles of his free-market advocacy group, the Club for Growth.

headline.seo: Chris Chocola of Club for Growth Was Less Fiscally Conservative in Congress
headline.main: A Conservative Leader Was Less So in Congress
headline.print_headline: A Conservative Leader Was Less So in Congress
